upcoming.synopsis:
What will happen when a desperate boy who grew up among evil people steps into the world of cultivating immortals? Immortals and demons can be separated by a thought, and life and death are not decided by heaven. Let's see how he goes against the current in this world where humans and demons coexist and evil spirits run rampant, and become a legend.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Jiang Ye
upcoming.synopsis:
The protagonist Ning Que travels to a seemingly real Tang Dynasty world, only to find that it is a dangerous world of cultivation. He originally thought that he could live a life of luxury and become superior, but he finds that he had no talent for cultivation. Additionally, he witnessed the massacre of his entire family at the age of four and was hunted for thousands of miles. While escaping death, he picked up a black umbrella in a sea of ​​blood and corpses and found the infant Sangsang. In despair, he found the motivation to live. Unwilling to bow to fate, he takes the big black umbrella and Sangsang, and begins a thrilling counterattack.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

upcoming.title: Voice & Stories
upcoming.synopsis: Anime adaptation of Voice & Stories.

upcoming.title: Dang Shen Bu Rang
upcoming.synopsis:
Yang Jian is the god in heaven who is in charge of eliminating disasters. He will violently and mercilessly destroy any target that brings harm to the three realms. However, the crisis of spiritual energy depletion in the world is imminent, and Yang Jian falls into the human world. Only by learning to influence the monsters in the world with true emotions instead of violence can he complete his mission and return to heaven as a god. Yang Jian, who has no other talent except violence, finds his his former partner Xiaotian Quan (a black dog), reincarnated as a mortal girl by the name of Wang Xiaoxiao, and begins a monster-hunting operation of unprecedented difficulty.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Shuangsheng Wu Hun
upcoming.synopsis:
Lin Fan, who was born in a noble family in Dalin County, was originally a peerless genius who was awarded the Tianjiao Order, but his martial soul was taken away by his fiancée, and he became a waste. When a mysterious demon parasitized Lin Fan and reactivated his abandoned martial soul, making him a rare dual martial soul physique, Lin Fan officially embarked on the road to rise, from a small county town to the heavens and the worlds.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Yu Ling Shi
upcoming.synopsis:
This tells the story of a popular cartoonist who became famous for his comic book .B.King. However, he ran out of ideas after many years and could only rely on constantly abandoning his characters to attract attention. One day, he received a mysterious phone call and was absorbed into the world of B.King as a character named Wang Xiaoming. Thus, the Wang Xiaoming who now has the thoughts of the "creator," along with the characters he created, embarks on a fantasy adventure that could be described as, "God's shortcut, one step to heaven."

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

upcoming.title: Kai Pai La! Guaishou Da Dianying
upcoming.synopsis:
Following a decline in the amount of monster movies created, Meng Qi, a director who is obsessed with the monster movie genre, becomes unsure about his persistence—he never expected that one day an actual monster would appear in front of him! In order to fulfill his dream, Meng Qi decides to cooperate with the demon girl Liya and help her shoot a demon themed movie. However, as the shooting progresses, Meng Qi discovers that things in the other world are closely related to him...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

upcoming.title: Wan Xiang Zhi Wang
upcoming.synopsis:
Luolan Mansion, one of the five major mansions of Daxia in Shenzhou Continent, has fallen into decline due to the mysterious disappearance of two mansion masters. Although the young mansion master Li Luo is extremely talented and was born with three phase palaces, he has difficulty practicing because of his natural empty phase. 

Jiang Qinge, with whom he had been engaged since childhood, has a ninth-grade light phase and is extremely talented. Realizing the gap between them, Li Luo wanted to cancel the contract and break off the engagement, but was rejected by Jiang Qinge. 

On his seventeenth birthday, Li Luo took away the secret treasure left by his parents and obtained the water light phase, but the price was that his hair turned white overnight and his life was overdrawn. If he wanted to extend his life, he had to reach the state of a marquis within five years.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Chao Neng Fuke Jing
upcoming.synopsis:
Gods descended, disasters were rampant! When the gods invaded the earth, the superpowers with the mysterious "leaf pattern" became the last sword and shield of mankind. While the two superpower academies in the East and the West, Gou Chen and Adam, were fighting hard, a Chinese boy quietly rose up. He had the ability to replicate superpowers, and with a mortal body, he held the power of the world and would eventually kill the gods. 

This is the carnival of the godslayers!

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Zi Jin: Yu Miao Fang
upcoming.synopsis:
In the Forbidden City, which has a long history and profound cultural heritage, there live many cute cats. From the perspective of humans, they live an enviable and leisurely life. Among them, six royal cats are special. They are responsible for protecting the memory of cultural relics of "Wuhua." They entered the world of Wuhua and defeated the destroyer Black Owl time and time again, bringing the world of Wuhua back on the right track and thus protecting the cultural relics. 

The six imperial cats are Luban and Momo from the literary class, and Shuangmei, Aobai, Pingan and Xiaozai from the martial class. Not only are they intelligent and brave, they also have a tacit understanding. They form the Forbidden City Imperial Cat Room, which protects the national treasures of the world.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Xin Yichang Shengwu Jianwen Lu: Xu
upcoming.synopsis:
Hao Ren was originally a young man who lived in a fourth-tier city and lived on the meager rent of an old house. When he went out to work, he accidentally became a "universe police officer." While he was still struggling to accommodate a group of abnormal creature tenants arranged by his superiors, his jurisdiction, the Dream Plane Universe, had already brewed a cosmic crisis. The mystery of the origin of abnormal creatures on Earth and the ruins of civilization in the Dream Plane Universe seem to be connected in some way. 

As Hao Ren's investigation deepened, the eldest son's world-destroying natural disaster, the goddess of creation fell, and one after another of the dusty and terrifying cases that had been buried for thousands of years bombarded his already useless brain circuit. Hao Ren gradually realized that he might not be able to slack off...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
upcoming.studios: Pb Animation Co. Ltd., LAN Studio, Sunflowers

upcoming.title: Wan Ren Zhi Shang
upcoming.synopsis:
Yi Feng traveled to the Xianjiang Continent. Since he was born without spiritual roots, he could only survive by relying on the "essential life skills" given by the system. Little did he know that in the eyes of those practitioners, his strength was already at the god level, and his every move affected the entire pattern of the Xianjiang Continent. Yi Feng easily resolved many crises without knowing it, which also brought about many passionate and hilarious scenes, and brought new opportunities and choices to the people living on this continent.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Yongbing Tianxia
upcoming.synopsis:
Three unknown mercenaries, with their unyielding spirit, wrote an unparalleled legend that will last through the ages.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Ugoku! Neko Mukashibanashi
upcoming.synopsis:
The cute comedy manga and anime take children's stories and folktales from all around the world and asks, "what if a cat appeared in this story?"

(Source: ANN)

upcoming.title: Jian Ke
upcoming.synopsis:
In the Sanlin Star Region of the Federation, Xu Le, an orphan from the Donglin area, works as a clerk in the shop of the mechanic Feng Yu. Feng Yu teaches Xu Le mechanic techniques and ancient martial arts moves. But one day, Feng Yu is hunted down by the Federation military, and Xu Le is inexplicably implicated and becomes a wanted criminal of the Federation. 

After witnessing Feng Yu's "death," Xu Le uses the chip left by Feng Yu to replace his own chip (which also confuses him as to who he is?) and changes his identity to study at Xinglihua University in the capital, where he meets Jian Shuier who's superstar of the Federation, Tai Zhiyuan who's a former royal family member of the Federation, Shi Qinghai who's a spy from Qinglong Mountain, and Zhang Xiaomeng who's a spy from Qinglong Mountain. He also drives a mecha for the first time and fights...

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Xuan Jie Zhi Men
upcoming.synopsis:
In a world where warriors are respected, Shi Mu's fate seems destined to be different. As the adopted son of an aristocratic family, he is forced to embark on the road of a warrior to find the truth and redeem himself. From the four halls of Fengcheng to the struggle between sects, interests are entangled, and powerful enemies lurk. Every challenge makes Shi Mu more determined. In the end, Shi Mu realizes the power of his bloodline, which not only changes his own destiny, but also affects the future of many people.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

upcoming.title: Aoshi Dan Shen
upcoming.synopsis:
Born with a disability, Shen Xiang risked everything to go to a dangerous place to find medicine in order to open up his spiritual veins. While looking for the medicine, he accidentally saved an injured goddess and demoness, and awakened his divine veins. He guarded his father and family and became a great god of alchemy!

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Zeri Feisheng
upcoming.synopsis:
In chaotic times, evil spirits are rampant and treacherous people are in power. At the same time, the underworld invaded, and the forces of the two worlds poisoned the human world. The snake catcher Xu Ying could not stand and watch the gods working for the underworld oppress the common people, so he rebelled and committed the crime of killing the gods. He also killed the court officials who did nothing. He was hunted down by the forces of the two worlds and began his life of escape...

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Gakkou de wa Oshiete Kurenai Taisetsu na Koto
upcoming.synopsis:
Unique and reliable "experts" appear before elementary school students who are struggling with issues such as "I'm not good at tidying up," "I keep putting off my homework because I'm so obsessed with games," and "My grades aren't improving as much as I'd like," and provide passionate instruction to teach them important things that they should learn but that they won't learn at school.

(Source: MANTANWEB, translated)

upcoming.title: Zi Heian Zhong Zou Lai
upcoming.synopsis:
Li Hai, a soldier leader who is tired of killing, transforms himself into a valley detective and hides in the city. He wants to live an ordinary life, but unexpectedly opens up a new world of extraordinary people. The darkness follows him like a shadow and there is no escape from it, so he goes back and defeats him!

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
upcoming.studios: Flying Fish Studio, Bu Keneng de Shijie

upcoming.title: Danbi wa Kkaebi
upcoming.synopsis:
Danbi and Kebi is a stop-motion series for preschoolers, featuring a four-year-old girl named Danbi and her magical fairy friend Kebi who often unfold a world of imagination. They are free spirited with silly sense of humour and depend on each other through thick and thin, and turn anything ordinary into a fun, fantastical playground of imagination. 

(Source: Official page)

upcoming.title: Dadao Duxing Zhi Die Long Bian
upcoming.synopsis:
Luo Li has been trapped in the soulless Yinzhou Continent since he was a child and became the number one killer of Tianjue Killing Hall. His father, Master Ciyun, sacrificed himself to buy Luo Li a chance to escape from Yinzhou and go to Zhongtian Main World to find the true way to cultivate immortality.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

upcoming.title: Caishen Dou Zhanlong
upcoming.synopsis:
Taoist Cui accidentally released the treasure-gathering golden toad in order to read the heavenly book. The golden toad coveted the prosperity of the human world and reincarnated as a human, Dou Zhanlong. In order to avoid the heavenly calamity, the golden toad tore the three souls and seven spirits in Dou Zhanlong's spiritual cavity, creating nine clones, which fell into nine places respectively. The nine Dou Zhanlongs were in different parallel time and space, and each death gave rise to a new clone. They experienced "nine deaths and thirteen disasters" in total. Our story starts with the first Dou Zhanlong.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Sou Shen Ji (ONA)
upcoming.synopsis:
The story takes place in the barbaric era of Yan Emperor and Huang Emperor. Just when many heroes were vying for supremacy in the Central Plains, the world-recognized leader, Emperor Shennong, passed away, and the heroes of the gold, wood, water, fire, and earth tribes were all ready to make a move. 

In the turbulent times, the young boy Tuoba Ye suddenly appeared and by chance obtained the dying inheritance of Emperor Shennong, thus starting a thrilling legendary journey.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Jiu Yang Wushen
upcoming.synopsis:
In his previous life, Ye Yunfei was gifted, but his martial veins suddenly closed and he could not practice martial arts. He was ridiculed by his family, betrayed by his fiancee, and encircled by various families. The young Ye Yunfei was deserted by his friends, bullied, sadly left by his beloved, and his father died tragically in battle. 

Fortunately, the Purple Saint True Lord who passed by Yunyou took him in as his disciple. Ye Yuntian grew up to be the youngest emperor in history, but was attacked when he was crossing the calamity. He was reborn when all the martial veins were lost, but it was also a passionate youth. Meeting his old relatives, friends, and lovers again, facing everything familiar, Ye Yunfei, a generation of emperor, chose to start over. 

There is still a trace of the soul of the emperor in his body, so that the memory of the previous life can be preserved intact. There is a dispute over fame and status inside, and the responsibility of honor and disgrace of the family veins outside. The imperial pride gathers, the four major sects are each for their own strength, and the heroes of Tianxuan Continent rise together. 

Ye Yunfei is familiar with the rules that the strong are respected in this world. With the help of the thousand-year memory of the Emperor of Heaven, Ye Yunfei's martial arts progressed amazingly, and he continued to grow in the martial arts world, and led his family and master to grow rapidly. Not long after the stabilization, foreign invaders came and invaded. Ye Yunfei led the people to resist and defend their homeland forever. 

In order to pursue a higher level of martial arts, Ye Yunfei left his hometown and embarked on a new journey, and finally became a generation of Emperor of Heaven. Having experienced too many insults and harassment, this life must be a life of killing gods and Buddhas, and riding a horse with a sword, living up to the youth.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.studios: G.H.Y. Culture & Media, Long Zhi Gu Wenhua

upcoming.title: Ta Xing
upcoming.studios: Xing Yi Kai Chen, Kuai Ying Hu Yu

upcoming.title: Tianzi Chuanqi: Ji Fa Pian
upcoming.synopsis:
Gifted with supernatural powers, Ji Fa was feared by King Zhou. In order to protect his relatives and friends, Ji Fa went berserk several times—his power got out of control and his life was in danger. The death of his master, the loss of his friends, the death of his mother, and the great mission bestowed upon the young hero, tempering him on the path to martyrdom.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
upcoming.studios: CG Year, Hei Chao Yinghua, Chenghuang Yinghua

upcoming.title: Qi Guo Yinhe
upcoming.synopsis:
Thousands of years after the fall of the Beichen Dynasty, the sons of destiny from four different forces help each other and grow from dealing with crisis after crisis. They work together to stop the war conspiracy of cutting-edge artificial intelligence.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Xiang Wang Shi
upcoming.synopsis:
The whale swallowed the present world, and the human race was in trouble. The boy practiced the "forgetfulness technique" at the cost of his memory to prevent the catastrophe! Will they live together in the face of adversity, or will they forget each other in the arena?

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
upcoming.studios: Bu Keneng de Shijie, Tang Cai Zhaopin

upcoming.title: Bei Xue
upcoming.synopsis:
Luo Han, a young man from the desert, goes to the Central Plains once every three years just to give a medicine cup to his friend Yi Lian. During this year's cup-sending trip, in order to help Yi Lian out of trouble, Luo Han gets involved, which leads to a huge theft of stolen silver, involving gangsters and dignitaries from the court, stirring up the world's political situation.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Saibo Jian Xian Tie Yu
upcoming.synopsis:
Fang Bailu, a modern terminally ill patient, wakes up after being frozen for a thousand years in a world where prosperous cyber and ancient cultivation are blended. He embarks on a journey to fight against destiny and face the disaster of the resurrection of a mysterious immortal.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Da Tang Chengfeng Lu
upcoming.synopsis:
The notorious divinely-skilled Mu Tianhou was suddenly ambushed, causing a stir in the martial arts world. Two upright disciples, Zheng Dongting and Zu Beiqiu (the useless brothers), met each other because of this. In order to help their younger brother Zu Beiqiu find his wife whom he had not seen for ten years, and also to find the real murderer who killed their master, a famous constable and a rich second-generation accidentally teamed up to venture into the world and embarked on an adventurous journey of delivering a divorce letter for thousands of miles. 

The two came to the Luo family in Yangzhou, but encountered the Luo family's massacre and were mistaken for the murderer. They were called "the two evildoers of Central Plains." Between the two of them, Zheng Dongting has martial arts that he cannot use, while Zu Beiqiu has martial arts that he doesn't know how to use. Although the brothers intend to clear their names, the misunderstandings of the various factions in the martial arts world continue to deepen, and the righteous martial arts people rise up to attack them. After experiencing manny dangerous situations, the two discovered that this was a big conspiracy against them...

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)

upcoming.title: Chang An Du Wu Si
upcoming.synopsis:
Martial artists with strange bones and unique skills are called Qiwu people. Some Qiwu people who pursued prosperity and peace surrendered to the imperial court and formed the "Duwu Division," while other Qiwu people who pursued hegemony in troubled times formed the "Zhenwu Society." 

In the early years of the Tang Dynasty, the Zhenwu Society was in chaos. Yun Xinxiao, a good-for-nothing brother who was invited to the capital of gods, joined the Chang An Duwu Division in the crisis, underwent a strange bone transplant and received unique skills. Yun Xinxiao and his fellow Duwusi companions, including Shi Nan and Themis, go from the streets to the imperial palace and into every corner of Chang An City, gradually uncovering the mysterious cause of death of their brother Yun Xinyao, and finding out the mastermind behind the death, Bu Wenjun, in a bid to crack down on a super terrorist attack against the current Supreme and even the entire prosperous age. The road of revenge and protection is full of unknowns. Yun Xinxiao's choice will determine the fate of Chang An...

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
